sentences.en: Because of its geographical isolation, the area developed its own unique culture.
sentences.cn: 由于地理上的隔绝，该地区发展了自己独特的文化。

sentences.en: Don't consider the facts in isolation from others.
sentences.cn: 不要孤立地考虑这些事实.

sentences.en: environmental problems must not be seen in isolation from social ones.
sentences.cn: 不能脱离社会问题孤立地看待环境问题。

sentences.en: He also talked briefly about the isolation he endured while in captivity.
sentences.cn: 他还简单谈及了他被俘期间忍受的孤独。

sentences.en: He retired and lived in relative isolation.
sentences.cn: 他退休后,生活比较孤寂.

sentences.en: His isolation has made him blunt about the feelings of others.
sentences.cn: 他的孤立使他对别人的感情木然无知.

sentences.en: I ejaculated mentally , " you deserve perpetual isolation from your species for your churlish inhospitality.
sentences.cn: ”我心里直叫, “ 只为你这样无礼待客,就该一辈子跟人群隔离.

sentences.en: I wanted quiet, isolation, to do some troublesome writing.
sentences.cn: 我需要安静, 与世隔绝, 好从事艰辛的创作.

sentences.en: Isolation strips should be cleared of all inflammable vegetation.
sentences.cn: 隔离带上所有易燃的植被应清除.

sentences.en: Malcolm works in isolation but I have no doubts about his abilities.
sentences.cn: 马尔科姆单打独干，但我对他的能力丝毫不怀疑。

sentences.en: Many deaf people have feelings of isolation and loneliness.
sentences.cn: 很多失聪者都有孤独无助的感觉。

sentences.en: No medication works in isolation but is affected to a greater or lesser extent by many other factors.
sentences.cn: 药物治疗不可能孤立地发生作用，多多少少会受很多其他因素的影响。

sentences.en: Taken in isolation these statements can be dangerous fallacies.
sentences.cn: 孤立地看，这些说法可能是危险的谬论。

sentences.en: The country has again achieved international respectability after years of isolation.
sentences.cn: 几年的孤立之后,该国又重新建立了国际声望.

sentences.en: The mansion sits in splendid isolation on top of the hill (= it is far from everything and looks impressive ).
sentences.cn: 宅邸位于山顶，远离尘嚣。

sentences.en: The millionaire lived in complete isolation from the outside world.
sentences.cn: 这位富翁过着与世隔绝的生活.

sentences.en: There was a loneliness, an isolation, about it that chilled her.
sentences.cn: 她还觉得这里有一种孤独 、 与世隔绝的感觉, 这也使她不寒而栗.

sentences.en: They told me about isolation and public apathy.
sentences.cn: 他们向我谈到了孤立无助和公众的冷漠。
